Jimly: Pernah Punya Masalah Hukum, Ahok dan Antasari Tak Bisa Jadi Anggota Dewas KPK
07 Nov 2019, 20:11 by iman


Jimly: Pernah Punya Masalah Hukum, Ahok dan Antasari Tak Bisa Jadi Anggota Dewas KPK

KBRN, Jakarta: Mantan Ketua Mahkamah Konstitusi Jimly Asshiddiqie  angkat bicara soal  rumor tentang mantan Gubernur DKI Jakarta Basuki Tjahaja Purnama (Ahok) dan mantan Ketua KPK Antasari Azhar bakal menjadi anggota Dewan Pengawas KPK. "Jikalau Ahok dan Antasari Azhar menjadi Dewan Pengawas KPK itu tidak mungkin, karena kesannya dikontrol politik. Apalagi kalau pernah ada masalah hukum. Saya kira sudah pasti Presiden Jokowi akan mencari yang aman," kata Jimly di Jakarta, Kamis (7/11/2019).Jimly pun menyodorkan nama mantan Jaksa Agung Basrief Arief dan mantan Ketua KPK Taufiqurahman Ruki atau Busyro Muqoddas sebagai calon Dewan Pengawas KPK. Nama-nama itu diyakini bakal memperkuat kinerja KPK dalam pemberantasan korupsi. "Sebab ada asumsi dewan pengawas ini akan melemahkan pimpinan. dewan pengawas yang nanti ditunjuk harus melawan itu, bukan melawan dalam arti negatif. Tetapi barus membunyikan bahwa tidak memperlemah malah memperkuat, jadi tidak punya kontroversi dalam politik. Cari yang kira-kira yang memperkuat," terangnya. Jimly berharap lima orang Dewan Pengawas KPK yang ditunjuk Presiden Jokowi taka berlatar belakang politisi. Dengan begitu, tak terjadi konflik kepentingan di KPK."Dewan Pengawas KPK yang berlatar belakang politis justru menyulitkan kinerja KPK," pungkasnya.

Jimly: Never Had a Legal Problem, Ahok and Antasari Could Not Become Members of the KPK Dewas
Nov. 07 2019, 20:11 by faith


Jimly: Never Had a Legal Problem, Ahok and Antasari Could Not Become Members of the KPK Dewas

KBRN, Jakarta: Former Chief Justice of the Constitutional Court Jimly Asshiddiqie spoke out about rumors about former DKI Jakarta Governor Basuki Tjahaja Purnama (Ahok) and former KPK Chairperson Antasari Azhar will become members of the KPK Supervisory Board. "If Ahok and Antasari Azhar become the KPK Supervisory Board is not possible, because his impression is controlled by politics. Especially if there have been legal problems. I think it is certain that President Jokowi will look for safety," Jimly said in Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019) ). Jimly offered the name of former Attorney General Basrief Arief and former KPK Chairman Taufiqurahman Ruki or Busyro Muqoddas as candidates for the KPK Supervisory Board. The names are believed to strengthen the performance of the KPK in combating corruption. "Because there is an assumption that this supervisory board will weaken the leadership. The supervisory board that will later be appointed must fight against it, not against it in a negative sense. But it has sounded that not weakening is actually strengthening, so there is no controversy in politics. Look for something that strengthens, "he explained. Jimly hoped that the five KPK Supervisory Board appointed by President Jokowi had no background in politicians. That way, there is no conflict of interest in the KPK. "The KPK Supervisory Board with a political background actually complicates the performance of the KPK," he concluded.
